attributes.action: introduce legislation to prevent any MP from employing relatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employing relatives makes it far too easy for collusion over expenses and many of the current problems would have been avoided is such a law existed,  In my opinion this and the abolition of the communication allowance are two critical factors in rebuilding public confidence.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
